name: The Agent 3
description:
－ABOUT－
Hello agent. We need your skills for a special mission. Unlike the previous games, you will be given a selection between three classes, which all give you a set of 2 guns. Eliminate them all.

－CONTROLS－
Arrow Keys/WASD・Move/Jump
Mouse/Space・Shoot
1 and 2・Toggle Weapons

－OFFICIAL FORUM－
https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/topic/666273/

－CREDITS－
Mick Gordon - The Only Thing They Fear Is You
Kevin MacLeod - In A Heartbeat
Kevin MacLeod - One Sly Move

Pixabay for mouse click sounds
